== About Me ==

I am Syam Kumar, a GNU/Linux enthusiast and freelance web developer based in Cochin, India. I currently specialize in standards oriented web development using LAMP (Linux, Apache, MySQL and PHP) Platform.

I have been using Linux since 2003 and ubuntu since 2006. I've Worked in Mandrake 8, Redhat 4, CentOS (4 and 5) and Ubuntu (5.10, 6.06 LTS, 7.04, 8.04 LTS, 9.04, 9.10, 10.04 LTS and 12.04 LTS).

http://sy.am/
